mapper.select: SELECT number , writer , subject , contents , date_format(created, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS created , password FROM board
SELECT number , writer , subject , contents , date_format(created, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS created , password FROM board WHERE number = #{number}
SELECT IF(count(number)/10 < 1, 1, count(number)/10+1) as board_count FROM board
mapper.insert: insert into board(writer, subject, contents, created, password ) value (#{writer}, #{subject}, #{contents}, NOW(), #{password})
